TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebEventBufferFlushInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含定义刷新缓冲区特性的参数。

span.span: Contains the parameters defining the flush buffer characteristics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视，可以管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据和负责处理此数据提供程序类型的运行状况事件类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含有助于管理运行状况事件的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 类定义标识缓冲区的当前状态的值。The class defines values that identify the buffer's current status. 类的实例作为参数传递给方法，用于处理已缓冲的消息。An instance of the class is passed as a parameter to the method that processes the messages that have been buffered. 需要刷新缓冲区时，ASP.NET 运行状况监视调用此方法。ASP.NET health monitoring calls this method when the flushing of the buffer is required. 这由定义的参数`bufferModes`中的元素`healthMonitoring`配置节。This is determined by the parameters defined by the `bufferModes` element in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. > [!NOTE] > 根据设计，缓冲机制可能会丢弃一些事件，以便与传入事件保持同步。By design, the buffering mechanism might drop some events in order to keep pace with the incoming events. 由用户调整此机制，通过适当地修改`bufferModes`中的元素`healthMonitoring`配置节。It is up to the user to adjust this mechanism by properly modifying the `bufferModes` element in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example shows how to use the class. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/CS/bufferedwebeventprovider.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/VB/bufferedwebeventprovider.vb#6)]

related.span: ASP.NET 运行状况监视概述

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Events As WebBaseEventCollection

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取当前消息中的事件集合。

span.span: Gets the events collection in the current message.

value.span: 当前消息中包含的 事件。

span.span: The events contained in the current message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于缓冲，通常单个消息中发送多个事件。Due to buffering, several events are usually sent in a single message. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. public: property int EventsDiscardedSinceLastNotification { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取自从上次通知以来丢弃的事件数。

span.span: Gets the number of events dropped since the last notification.

value.span: 自从上次通知以来缓冲机制丢弃的事件数。

span.span: The number of events dropped by the buffering mechanism since the last notification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根据设计，缓冲机制可能会丢弃一些事件，以便与传入事件保持同步。By design, the buffering mechanism might drop some events in order to keep pace with the incoming events. 由用户调整此机制，通过适当地修改`bufferModes`中的元素`healthMonitoring`配置节。It is up to the user to adjust this mechanism by properly modifying the `bufferModes` element in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. The number of events in the buffer.
